articles.title: Four Regions Of The Sun Seen Exploding Simultaneously - IFLScience
articles.description: At the moment it is unclear if the debris will hit Earth.
articles.content:
NASA's Solar Dynamics Observatory (SDO) captured a rare phenomenon on Tuesday, April 23: four enormous regions of the Sun exploding simultaneously.

articles.title: Major changes approved for ClearSpace-1 mission - SpaceNews
articles.description: Under the new plan approved by ESA’s Space Safety Programme Board, OHB SE of Bremen, Germany, will provide the satellite bus and lead systems integration and launch.
